author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENA STARTING TO WEAKEN... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA...
summary: ...LORENA STARTING TO WEAKEN... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 2:00 AM MST Thu Sep 04 the center of Lorena was located near 24.0, -113.7 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENA STARTING TO WEAKEN... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 2:00 AM MST Thu Sep 04 the center of Lorena was located near 24.0, -113.7 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
